channel.title: Google on akifmt
channel.description: Recent content in Google on akifmt

item.title: VNC Server on Google Cloud Ubuntu
item.description: VNC Server on Google Cloud Ubuntu 16.04; # Updates: sudo apt-get update sudo apt-get upgrade # Setup: sudo apt install xfce4 xfce4-goodies tightvncserver vncserver vncserver -kill :1 mv ~/.vnc/xstartup ~/.vnc/xstartup.bak nano ~/.vnc/xstartup xstartup content: #!/bin/bash xrdb $HOME/.Xresources startxfce4 & sudo chmod +x ~/.vnc/xstartup vncserver To connect via Windows: Download link
